meanings.sent1: The rumbling of thunder could be heard in the distance.
meanings.sent2: The rumbling of the train passing by was soothing.
meanings.sent3: The rumbling of the stomach during the quiet class made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The rumbling of the waterfall echoed through the canyon.
meanings.sent5: The rumbling of the earthquake shook the entire town.

meanings.definition: The act of making a deep, low, continuous sound.
meanings.sent1: The rumbling of the engine signaled the start of the race.
meanings.sent2: His rumbling of laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent3: The rumbling of the snoring dog interrupted the peaceful night.
meanings.sent4: The rumbling of the crowd's excitement could be felt in the air.
meanings.sent5: The rumbling of the drums added energy to the music performance.
